ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Level 22 woes (or why Unrest STILL sucks)  LONG
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Next time you re wounded, note your hp.  Fire up Hymn, then immediately stop it.  Wait.  Note how many hp you gain each pulse (server updating the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 7 Mar 2000, Kevin L. Crawford wrote:
>
> I'm not sure what you're considering 'pulses'.
>
> Hymn of Restoration has a duration of approximately 10 - 12 seconds
> Most of our DoT's have a duration of about 15 - 18 seconds
> (I'm not positive on the time as lag/network latency could be throwing off
> my timer)

Next time you're wounded, note your hp. Fire up Hymn, then
immediately stop it. Wait. Note how many hp you gain each
"pulse" (server updating the client). Note that this only
happens twice. Note that the total number of hp healed
reflects the song only pulsing twice.

Now do it with a DoT - fire it up once and watch the mob's
health bar. Note that it falls three times, again once per
"pulse." I just want to verify that there's no client ->
server -> client weirdness going on here, and the DoTs really
do have 3 pulses.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
